data.name: ZOOMG
EbanoeIT (ebanoe.it) Dark
Compact Amadeus SellConnect
data.description:
Restyle of Amadeus SellConnect with a focus on:
- a more sleek and compact use of the toolbars
- creating more real estate for the Command Page interface
- making a dedicated room for the Command History widget
- remove Add Banner

data.name: Youtube Music Desktop Redesign
data.description: A complete redesign of the YTM Desktop. Keep in mind the CSS is written very poorly and there are things still missing that I don't use often personally.

data.name: Canta darker for Mastodon
data.description:
Canta Darker is a theme for Mastodon. It is based on Canta-Dark.

· Scrollbar choice :
styled: keep as is
native: delete both .column-scroller rules
none: uncomment rule 2 and delete rule 3
